entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Corerun not being copied over on windows 7 machines, causing many test failures #65906
  • Initial executable memory allocation on ARM64 Linux is not right #65900
  • WASI support tracking #65895
  • Ldap GetMembers working over 389 port #65894
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #65890
  • A large set of configuration keys provided by the built-in .NET IConfigurationProvider's negatively affect performance significantly #65885
  • [Question] Should we replace another usage of StringBuilder with ValueStringBuilder in System.Private.Xml/XmlConvert? #65884
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\eh\\eh03_small\\eh03_small.cmd #65883
  • Deadletter.txt for System.Memory.Tests #65882
  • [wasm] Interpreter: Local variable of function pointer type emits a warning `Test.Prepare: Store local stack type mismatch 0 7` #65881
    7.0.0
  • OpenSslCryptographicException: error:03000098:digital envelope routines::invalid digest on CentOS Stream 9 #65874

Closed

  • Improve Regex's knowledge of captures and atomicity in the tree #62451
    7.0.0
  • framework 5.0 is not installed (?? but is) #60978
  • Building a dotnet6 project on the M1 processor is incompatible with x64 architecture, despite using rid=linux-x64 #63197
  • Span indexer doesn't elide bounds check when span initialized from an RVA static #13464
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.GzipStreamUnitTests.ReadAsync_ContinuesOnCurrentTaskSchedulerIfDesired #65873
  • System.IO.Compression.GzipStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success library test failed #65891
  • Investigate adding capture support for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #61904
    7.0.0
  • JIT doesn't eliminate bounds checks on const strings #1343
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DisposeAsync.DisposeAsyncFlushes #65872
  • CopyContext in Thread::RedirectCurrentThreadAtHandledJITCase sometimes fails #65776
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [DONT MERGE] Use Int build pool #65912
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Startup scenarios #65911
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • null-check the redirect context before using. #65910
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation race condition in PipeStream cancellation callback #65909
    area-System.IO
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing a debug build #65908
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Fix case of passing regNumber as regMaskTP #65907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AssemblyName overload for ILVerity.IResolver.Resolve method #65905
    area-ILVerification
  • JIT: OSR jitstress fixes; enable struct promotion #65903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add missing GC.SuppressFinalize(this) to FileStream.DisposeAsync #65899
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Make Is*Project properties unambiguous and improve IsGeneratorProject detection #65896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Disable System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DisposeAsync.DisposeAsyncFlushes test #65892
    area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Update WASI-enabled runtime to support running ASP.NET Core #65888
    area-Build-mono
  • Update GenAPI usage and code clean-up #65887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ZipArchiveEntry names shown as corrupted on other zip programs #65886
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • `GetTypeFields` should return `ELEMENT_TYPE_BYREF`. #65880
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • EE Suspension on x86 should use RtlRestoreContext when available #65878
    area-VM-coreclr
  • retire DummyTcpServer from SslStream tests #65876
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Generate fabricbot config for the machinelearning repo #65875
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Run trim analyzer #65870
    * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • [Perf][Maui] Set only android-arm64 to be built for Maui #65747
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI]Maui Install Workaround Fix #65904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove usages of native bootstrapping #65901
    area-Infrastructure
  • Centralize regex tree analysis for atomic/capture/backtracking detection #65734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reduce TypeGeneratorTests log spew to 1% of its previous size #65871
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Mark architecture-specific tests with ConditionalFact attributes #65862
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add disabled tests to ProjectExclusions #65877
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65865
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Cleanup fragile NGen leftovers #65869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add `StringMarshallingCustomType` to `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` #65855
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Do not copy XState other than AVX when redirecting for GC stress #65825
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #65483
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-author-action
  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui version info to stored data. Runtime Side #65800
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • support WindowsPrincipal in HttpListenerWebSocketContext #65746
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Change regex source generator to emit returns rather than jumps to NoMatch #65599
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Update windows build machines #65798
    area-Infrastructure
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    * NO MERGE *, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #65766
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #65863
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Native aot trim annotations experiment #65816
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65773
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_STORE_OBJ and GT_OBJ #1825

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet install -g dotnet-ef #24102
  • New RPM packages for Fedora 35 is not working. SDK's not found #24099
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects #24093

Closed

  • Rename "NetSdkManaged" types to "FileBased" #23758
    6.0.3xx
  • short URL for "what's new" still pointing to .NET 5 docs #24081

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads
  • Backport #24086 to release/5.0.4xx #24101
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport #24086 to release/6.0.2xx #24100
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add EnableAotAnalyzer support into SDK #24091
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Remove override into preview version of System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #24086
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add design for cross-version workloads #24070
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1632061 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145

  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935

PullRequests

Created

  • Leave type parameters untouched by 'nameof(parameter)' feature #5829
  • Remove incorrect `override` keywords #5828

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code cleanup on save adds extra steps in back (Undo) history #59781
  • RegexGenerator does not work in Razor files #59780
  • 'Move to namespace' refactoring does not work for types in the global namespace #59778
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens `isFinalized` property continually returning false on document open #59777
  • Unexpected scoping on type parameter of local function #59775
    17.2
  • [LSP] Doc comment completions do not auto-insert attribute content #59773
  • [LSP] Razor C# doc comments do not auto-complete #59772
  • Disallow optional parameter attributes in lambdas #59770
  • NavigableSymbolService.NavigableSymbol should not strongly root a document #59768
  • Severe Performance Issues with Roslyn Background Analysis Service #59766
  • Cannot implement explicit interface member that returns Task<T?> #59765
  • `NotNullIfNotNullAttribute` doesn't work for nullable value-typed parameters #59764
  • Inheritance margin should correctly merge the results for multi-TFM and linked file cases #59762
    17.2
  • Source Generator AnalyzerConfigOptions delete all Property text after the first newline or semicolon #59761

Closed

  • Crash in compilation tracker source generator handling. #57082
    17.2
  • Project subsetting for OOP sync may be breaking with open source generated files #56998
    17.2
  • VS2022 Lightbulb configure severity of Analyzer did not change editorconfig #57490
    17.2
  • `Span<T>` range indexer not be converted to `Slice(int start)` #59732

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable additional text comparer in generator driver (#59776) #59786
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable Auto-Open behavior for Stack Trace Explorer #59785
    Area-IDE
  • Make the IDocumentNavigationSerivice entirely async. #59784
    Area-IDE
  • Port more tests #59783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add OmniSharpCompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync #59782
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/rename_ui_rework into main #59779
    Area-IDE
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Remove unnecessary accesses on XML end tag #59771
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow creating doc comments around existing comments #59763
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Disable additional text comparer in generator driver #59776
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • [LSP] Cache parsed xml snippets for razor #59605
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Simplify goto def command handler #59769
    Area-IDE, Next
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Correctly handle a cached solution having frozen generated documents #59723
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete Emit2.cs #59753
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Extract out cache logic from the LSP pull diagnostics code. #59711
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update message to reflect cleanup behavior #59755
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simple attempt to find implementation assembly #59684
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59747
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add missing O# context factories #59727
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Add missing API to IVSTypeScriptDiagnosticService #59751
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • use same defaults for naming style as ship with the dotnet sdk #58185
    Area-IDE
  • Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE
  • Copy source file to a temp path instead of using it directly #59685
    Area-IDE
  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers
  • AnalyzeDataFlow: Added missing handling for delegate construction from extension method #59745
    Area-Compilers
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust error wording for members in top-level programs #59734
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add MetadataAsSource test for records #59736
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, 17.3
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When MVC uses parameters to get submitted data, Request.Body cannot get the data. #40421
  • Extra double quote in classname in <div> tag is not an error and page looks OK but <a asp-page="/Page"> does not work #40418
    Backlog
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Build.Framework, Version=15.1.0.0 #40417
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets(442,5): error : Two assets found targeting the same path with incompatible asset kinds #40416
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #40415
  • Reconnect modal displays immediately in Firefox upon navigation #40414
  • SignalR negotiation sometimes fails on the first attempt #40413
  • Consider JsonValidationMetadataProviders affect only API Controllers #40408
  • [Discussion] Blazor components are type activated by default #40405
    Discussions

Closed

  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
    Test failures
  • Quarantine StopProcessingNextRequestSendsGracefulGOAWAYThenFinalGOAWAYWhenAllStreamsComplete #39492
    Test failures
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #39479
    Test failures
  • Quarantine GOAWAY_Received_SetsConnectionStateToClosingAndWaitForAllStreamsToComplete #39520
    Test failures
  • Possible incorrect sorting in KnownHeaders.cs #40062
  • .NET 6 & VS2022 minimal API templates #38513
    Discussions
  • Blazor, InputText does not support changing the EditContext dynamically, when adding forms dynamically #40388
  • UseCorrectCatchAllBehavior breaks optional parameter behavior #40389
  • Add overload to modify StaticFileOptions for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles #40390
  • Indentation in new Web API project #40401
  • [Blazor] Razor components give build errors if project includes any reference with "System" as the final part of its namespace #40391
  • Custom icon is not getting set in visual studio 2019 #40289
  • Static Assets -- what's happening? #40369

PullRequests

Created

  • !nits! Cleanup three projects #40422
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40420
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect h2 header decoding. #40412
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Speed up contended HTTP/2 frame writing (500% gRPC h2 70x1 improvement) #40407
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Cleanup ActivatorUtilities #40409
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine fixed tests #40419
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Clarify sort order for known headers #40410
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable CA1810 as a warning #40384
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Do not merge] Test IIS locally on CI #40381
    area-runtime
  • Add missing `BeforeTargets` for IIS local testing #40379
    area-runtime
  • Mark -internal blobs as nonshipping #40380
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Removed duplicated and nested dispatcher invoking. #40366
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Clean up indentation #40400
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix ResourceManagerStringLocalizerFactory caching #33129
    area-mvc
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] WebView CanGoBack/Forward doesn't update correctly #4938
  • VisualTypeConverter loops over all assemblies looking for IVisual types #4937
  • [Bug] Windows button rollover doesn't update on rollout #4935
  • Unable to install main Maui following Dev instructions #4934
  • Android and iOS devices not available debug window after installing Preview 13 (VS 2022 17.2.0 P1) #4932
  • Microsoft.UI.Xaml does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft' #4931
  • [Bug] Button VisualState doesn't reset after Pressed #4930
  • TupleElementNamesAttribute is being trimmed in Android and iOS apps, but BindingExpression relies on it #4929
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting WPF #4927
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting WinUI #4926
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting Android from Mac #4925
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting macOS from Mac #4924
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting macOS from Windows #4923
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting iOS from Windows #4921
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting iOS from Mac #4920
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting Android from VS (Windows) #4919
  • [Windows] Button in BindableLayout Don't Get Unhighlighted When Mouse Leaves #4918
  • Width and Height value of ContentPage not filled #4915
  • ImageButton Image not scaling down by Width- and HeightRequest #4913
  • Formalize Brush string syntax #4910

Closed

  • Implement Navigating, Navigated events in WebViewHandler #3440
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView: WindowsFormsDispatcher.InvokeAsync implementation issues #2313
  • Explore using System.OperatingSystem for API checks #461
  • Add doc comments for BlazorWebView public APIs #4696
  • [Bug] Drawn line does not shown on view while it point difference is 8000 #2182
  • [Bug] Consuming WCF Service Problem System.Servicemodel #3073
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not work for transformed elements #4613
  • Fix Razor Scoped CSS so it doesn't cause errors in iOS/MacCatalyst bundle targets #2981
  • The path 'XXXXXXX\Shared\MainLayout.razor.css' would result in a file outside of the app bundle and cannot be used. #4061
  • Issue building the project #4800
  • Visual Studio Preview 2022 Crashing When Opening Create App Packages Wizard #4073
  • MAUI csproj properties altered after project creation #4631
  • Maui-WinUI : Unable to re use the path for gap filled arc shape drawing #3507
  • Back navigation doesn't work for modal pages on a windows app. #3572
  • [Windows] Crash using RadioButtonGroup with a StackLayout #4508
  • [Bug] ScrollView doesn't center a child if the child has Shadow defined #3106
  • [Bug] ContentPage.OnSizeAllocated is never called. #2373
  • [Bug] images loaded from URI's on iOS/WinUI aren't currently re-measuring #2932
  • Null Reference Exception thrown if HotReload enabled #3628
  • Xamarin Maui DisplayAlert does not appear (no message display pop-up) when using NavigationPage #3415
  • Maui preview 4.0 when try to realease application show error #4369

PullRequests

Created

  • Flowdirection window #4936
  • Enable File Picker in Blazor Android WebView #4928
    platform/android 🤖, area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Use bash to install dotnet rather than sh #4916
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • [X] remove generation of __InitComponentRuntime #4911

Merged

  • [android] refactor font loading #4933
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • Ensure InvokeAsync(Func<Task>) is properly awaited #4873
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Convert dp to px when setting ImageButton.CornerRadius #4820
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Detect when image failed to load in Windows ImageButton #4816
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • IBorder now works again for iOS/Android #4909
  • [Android] Hide Keyboard in Android Entry and Editor when back key is pressed #4827
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS][macOS] Remove more superflous version checks #4906
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Essentials] Fix maciOS version checks #4908
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [android] add projects to record AOT profiles #4859
  • Add doc comments for BlazorWebView APIs #4904
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update LICENSE #4905
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Move TabbedPageHandler to TabbedViewHandler #4893
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Scoping doc #4679
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does EFCore automatically parameterize Skip/Take values now? #27512
  • efbundle tries to make a connection to the OnConfiguring connection string despite using --connection parameter #27510
  • Remplacing Owned Entity with default value property is not propagated to database #27509
  • Use respawn to speed up tests which need to clean data #27508
  • SQL Server: cannot batch-insert entities with generated values only that have a computed column #27507
  • Must be reducible node thrown when projecting sub collection to a get only list. #27506
  • How to instantiate value object using one db column #27505

Closed

  • SQL Server: When retrieving generated columns in insert, concurrency may cause us not to get the original generated value #27446

PullRequests

Created

  • Map check constraints only to the tables for which they are declared #27511

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.23.0 to 3.25.0 #27487
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #27395
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime dependencies in Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #13281

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make NuGet.config copy path in source-build CI more explicit #13265
  • [release/3.1.4xx] Revert back to 16.04 dockerfile temporarily #13283
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13277
